models.installation: Requires water inlet, drainage, and 220V power outlet. Clearance: 10cm sides, 15cm back.

common_issues.fix: Ensure door is firmly shut and latch clicks
Check water supply tap is open and hose not kinked

models.maintenance: Clean filter monthly, descale every 3 months, wipe rubber seal after use

manual.overview: Front-load automatic washing machine for household use with 9kg capacity, inverter motor technology, and smart connectivity features.
installation_steps: Place on flat, stable surface
Remove transport bolts from rear (4 bolts)
Connect water inlet hose to cold water tap
Connect drain hose to drainage pipe or sink
Plug into grounded 220V power outlet
Run test cycle without laundry
first_time_use: Run empty rinse cycle at 90°C to clean drum
Check for any leaks during first cycle
Review all wash programs in manual
daily_usage: Do not overload beyond 9kg capacity
Use HE (High Efficiency) detergent only
Sort laundry by color and fabric type
Leave door slightly open after wash to prevent odor
safety_guidelines: Keep children away from machine during operation
Do not touch power plug with wet hands
Turn off power before cleaning or maintenance
Do not wash items with gasoline or flammable substances
do_not: Do not wash shoes or heavy items like mats
Do not use hot water above 60°C regularly
Do not pull door open forcefully during cycle
Do not use bleach in steam wash mode
manual.environmental_conditions: Operating temperature: 5°C to 40°C. Avoid direct sunlight and moisture.
manual.storage: If storing unused, keep door slightly open and disconnect power

service_required: Motor failure or unusual grinding noise
voids_warranty_if: Opened control panel or motor housing
Used industrial or non-HE detergent causing damage

claim_process: Authorized technician will visit within 48 hours

models.installation: Requires 220V outlet. Clearance: 10cm sides, 15cm back for ventilation. Allow 24hrs before use.

common_issues.fix: Set thermostat to 3-4°C for fridge, -18°C for freezer
Normal operation. If excessive, ensure unit is level

models.maintenance: Clean condenser coils every 6 months, check door seals quarterly

manual.overview: 360L frost-free refrigerator with inverter compressor technology, digital temperature control, and energy-efficient cooling system for households.
installation_steps: Remove all packaging and protective tape
Place on level floor with clearance: 10cm sides, 15cm back, 10cm top
Plug into dedicated 220V grounded outlet
Wait 24 hours before loading food (allows coolant to settle)
Set temperature: Fridge 3-4°C, Freezer -18°C
Clean interior with mild soap before first use
first_time_use: Allow 24 hours to reach optimal temperature
Do not load perishables until temperature stabilizes
Test door seal by closing on paper - should hold firmly
daily_usage: Do not overload shelves
Keep door closed as much as possible
Allow hot food to cool before storing
Clean spills immediately to prevent odor
safety_guidelines: Do not store flammable liquids
Keep ventilation grilles clear
Do not use sharp objects to remove frost
Unplug before cleaning
do_not: Do not use extension cords
Do not store glass bottles in freezer
Do not wash with water directly on electrical parts
Do not block air vents inside
manual.environmental_conditions: Operating temperature: 10°C to 43°C ambient. Avoid direct sunlight.
manual.storage: If unused, clean, dry, and leave door slightly open

user_fixable: Clean door seals with warm water
voids_warranty_if: Power surge damage without surge protector

claim_process: Provide model and serial number (inside fridge)

Normal operation. If excessive, ensure unit is level

models.maintenance: Clean condenser coils every 6 months, check door seals quarterly

models.installation: Charge fully before first use. Pair via Bluetooth settings.

common_issues.fix: Hold power button 5s until LED blinks blue/red. Remove from device list and re-pair
Check both device and headphone volume. Disable any limiters in settings

models.maintenance: Clean earpads with damp cloth monthly. Store in case when not in use

manual.overview: Premium over-ear wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 40-hour battery life, and multipoint Bluetooth connectivity.
installation_steps: Charge fully using USB-C cable (2 hours)
Turn on headphones (hold power button 3 seconds)
Enable Bluetooth on your device
Look for 'SoundPro ANC Elite' in Bluetooth list
Select to pair
LED will turn solid blue when connected
first_time_use: Download SoundPro app for firmware updates
Customize EQ settings in app
Test ANC modes (ANC On, Ambient, ANC Off)
Adjust headband for comfort
daily_usage: Charge when battery drops below 20%
Use carrying case for protection
Clean earpads weekly with damp cloth
Update firmware when available
safety_guidelines: Do not use at excessive volume (hearing damage risk)
Be aware of surroundings when using ANC
Do not use while driving
Keep away from water
do_not: Do not fold forcefully
Do not expose to rain or water
Do not charge with non-certified cables
Do not use damaged earpads
manual.environmental_conditions: Operating temperature: -10°C to 45°C. Store in dry place.
manual.storage: Store in case. Charge to 50% if storing for more than 1 month

user_fixable: Clean charging port with dry brush

not_covered: Normal battery wear (80% capacity after 500 cycles)
claim_process: Ship to service center (prepaid label provided)

models.installation: DANGER: Professional installation required. High voltage system.

common_issues.fix: This requires a certified technician. Please do not attempt this.
This requires a certified technician. Please do not attempt this.

models.maintenance: Professional inspection annually. Never open battery case.

manual.overview: High-performance 48V 100Ah lithium battery for electric vehicles and energy storage systems with integrated BMS protection.
installation_steps: DANGER: Hire certified technician only
Turn off vehicle main power
Disconnect existing battery safely
Mount battery using vibration-resistant brackets
Connect terminals with insulated tools (red positive, black negative)
Verify polarity before powering on
Power system and check BMS status indicator
first_time_use: Charge battery to 100% before first use
Allow battery to rest for 30 minutes after first charge
Perform low-speed test drive
Monitor temperature during first 5 charge cycles
daily_usage: Avoid discharging below 20%
Avoid charging above 95% regularly (for longevity)
Monitor temperature using BMS app if available
Charge at moderate rate (not fast charge) when possible
safety_guidelines: DANGER: High voltage - risk of electric shock
Never expose to water or rain
Never short-circuit terminals
Keep away from flammable materials
Use only approved chargers
Do not open casing under any circumstances
do_not: Do not drop or impact
Do not puncture or pierce
Do not weld near battery
Do not charge unattended overnight
Do not use if swollen or damaged
manual.environmental_conditions: Operating temperature: -10°C to 45°C. Storage temperature: 10°C to 30°C. Avoid extreme heat.
manual.storage: Store at 40–60% charge if unused for more than 1 month. Store in cool, dry place.

battery_health.health_check_method: Check capacity via BMS diagnostics or authorized service tool. Mobile app shows real-time health percentage.

user_fixable: Dirty terminals (clean with dry cloth only)

coverage: Cell failure above 80% degradation threshold within 5 years
Capacity warranty: 80% after 3000 cycles or 5 years
claim_process: Run BMS diagnostic report via app

check: Check charger output voltage (should match battery specs)
Check BMS LED status (green = normal, red = fault)
troubleshooting_flow.if_not_resolved: STOP. Contact authorized service center immediately. Do not attempt further troubleshooting.

check: Allow battery to cool in ventilated area
troubleshooting_flow.if_not_resolved: DANGER: Do not reuse. Call service center. Do not charge until inspected.
Contact service center for capacity test and health assessment.

lifecycle.performance_degradation: Capacity reduces gradually after 3000 cycles. Expected 80% capacity at end of warranty.
lifecycle.end_of_life_guidance: Return to certified VoltMax recycling center. Do not dispose in household waste. Contains hazardous materials. Recycling is free for warranty customers.
